# A PyFixest Regression Table
As @tbl-main shows, LaTex Tables generated by PyFixest can be easily integrated into Quarto document when rendered as pdf.

::: {#tbl-main .cell tbl-pos='H' tbl-cap='A PyFixest Regression Table' execution_count=2}
\renewcommand\cellalign{t}
\begin{threeparttable}
\begingroup
\renewcommand\arraystretch{1}
\setlength{\tabcolsep}{3pt}
\begin{tabularx}{\linewidth}{@{}>{\raggedright\arraybackslash}X>{\centering\arraybackslash}X>{\centering\arraybackslash}X>{\centering\arraybackslash}X>{\centering\arraybackslash}X}
\toprule
 & \multicolumn{2}{c}{Wage} & \multicolumn{2}{c}{Wealth} \\
\cmidrule(lr){2-3} \cmidrule(lr){4-5}
 & \multicolumn{1}{c}{US} & \multicolumn{1}{c}{China} & \multicolumn{1}{c}{US} & \multicolumn{1}{c}{China} \\
\cmidrule(lr){2-2} \cmidrule(lr){3-3} \cmidrule(lr){4-4} \cmidrule(lr){5-5}
 & (1) & (2) & (3) & (4) \\
\midrule
\addlinespace[1ex]
Age & \makecell{-0.95*** \\ (0.066)} & \makecell{-0.924*** \\ (0.056)} & \makecell{-1.267*** \\ (0.211)} & \makecell{-1.232*** \\ (0.211)} \\
\addlinespace[0.5ex]
\addlinespace[0.5ex]
Years of Schooling & \makecell{-0.174*** \\ (0.018)} & \makecell{-0.174*** \\ (0.015)} & \makecell{-0.131* \\ (0.056)} & \makecell{-0.118* \\ (0.056)} \\
\addlinespace[0.5ex]
\midrule
\addlinespace[1ex]
Industry & x & x & x & x \\
\addlinespace[0.5ex]
\addlinespace[0.5ex]
Year & - & x & - & x \\
\addlinespace[0.5ex]
\midrule
\addlinespace[1ex]
Observations & 997 & 997 & 998 & 998 \\
\addlinespace[0.5ex]
\addlinespace[0.5ex]
$R^2$ & 0.489 & 0.659 & 0.12 & 0.172 \\
\addlinespace[0.5ex]
\bottomrule
\end{tabularx}
\endgroup
